meanings.definition: Attracted to both males and females.
meanings.sent1: She is ambisexual and enjoys dating people regardless of their gender.
meanings.sent2: The ambisexual individual is open to romantic relationships with anyone, regardless of gender.
meanings.sent3: Being ambisexual means never having to worry about limiting your dating pool.
meanings.sent4: Her ambisexual nature allows her to appreciate the beauty in all individuals, regardless of gender.
meanings.sent5: The ambisexual person's heart is a vast ocean, open to all who come with love.

meanings.sent1: The artist's ambisexual style blends masculine and feminine elements seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The character in the movie had an ambisexual appearance that intrigued the audience.
meanings.sent3: The ambisexual fashion trend mixes traditional gender norms in a fun and creative way.
meanings.sent4: Her ambisexual personality shines through in her ability to empathize with both men and women.
meanings.sent5: The ambisexual design of the building combined strength and elegance in a unique way.
